task.title: Navigate Between Records
task.shortdesc: Navigate between records in the Session Editor window.

step.cmd: To go to the next record in your session, select the Session Next record menu item or click the right arrow at the top of the Session Editor.
step.stepresult: Views will update to display information for the next record in your session, and the number of the currently visible record will be displayed.

step.cmd: To go to the previous record in your session, select the Session Previous record menu item or click the left arrow.
To jump to the last record in your session, select the Session Last record menu item or click the right arrow with vertical line.
To jump to the first record in your session, select the Session First record menu itme or click the left arrow with vertical line.
To navigate to a specific record using its number, click on the current record number and type in the desired number.
